Tip.Value: 不需打开文件直接复制文件文本内容 非Unicode编码文件可能会乱码
You do not need to open the file directly copy the file text content, not Unicode encoding may be garbled

Command.Arguments: -noexit write-host '"%1"';$args = 'md5', 'sha1', 'sha256', 'sha384', 'sha512', 'mactripledes', 'ripemd160'; foreach($arg in $args){get-filehash '"%1"' -algorithm $arg | select-object algorithm, hash | format-table -wrap}

REG_SZ.MUIVerb: 显示/隐藏 隐藏文件

CreateFile.Content: Dim wsh On Error Resume Next Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") path = "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced\HideFileExt" value = 1 If wsh.RegRead(path) = value Then value = 0 wsh.RegWrite path, value, "REG_DWORD" wsh.SendKeys "{F5}" Set wsh = Nothing

REG_SZ.MUIVerb: 显示/隐藏 隐藏文件

CreateFile.Content: Dim wsh On Error Resume Next Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") path = "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced\Hidden" value = 1 If wsh.RegRead(path) = value Then value = 2 wsh.RegWrite path, value, "REG_DWORD" wsh.SendKeys "{F5}" Set wsh = Nothing

REG_SZ.MUIVerb: 显示/隐藏 系统隐藏文件
Show or Hide Hidden System Files

CreateFile.Content: Dim wsh On Error Resume Next Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") path = "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced\ShowSuperHidden" value = 1 If wsh.RegRead(path) = value Then value = 0 wsh.RegWrite path, value, "REG_DWORD" wsh.SendKeys "{F5}" Set wsh = Nothing

Tip.Value: 截屏后可直接Ctrl+V粘贴图片 适用位置:Word, QQ, PS等 快捷键:Win+Shift+S
After taking a screenshot, you can directly press Ctrl+V to paste the picture. It is suitable for Word, PS and other programs. The shortcut key is Win+Shift+S

CreateFile.Content: Dim wsh On Error Resume Next Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") path = wsh.RegRead("HKCU\Control Panel\Desktop\WallPaper") wsh.Run("explorer /select, " & path) Set wsh = Nothing

Dim wsh On Error Resume Next Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") path = "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\ShowDriveLettersFirst" value = 2 If wsh.RegRead(path) = value Then value = 0 wsh.RegWrite path, value, "REG_DWORD" wsh.SendKeys "{F5}" Set wsh = Nothing

Dim wsh On Error Resume Next Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") path = "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Classes\Drive\TileInfo" value = "prop:*System.PercentFull;System.Computer.DecoratedFreeSpace;System.Volume.FileSystem" If wsh.RegRead(path) = value Then value = "prop:System.FreeSpace;System.Capacity" End If wsh.RegWrite path, value wsh.SendKeys "{F5}" Set wsh = Nothing

Tip.Value: 系统原生菜单项需按住Shift显示, 此项可以直接显示, 路径不带双引号
The system raw lettuce item needs to hold down Shift display, this item can be displayed directly, path without double quotation marks
系统原生菜单项需按住Shift显示, 此项可以直接显示, 路径带双引号
The system raw lettuce item needs to hold down Shift display, this item can be displayed directly, path with double quotation marks

CreateFile.Content: Dim wsh, fso, shortcut Set paths = WScript.Arguments Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") desktop = wsh.SpecialFolders("Desktop") For i = 0 To paths.Count - 1 path = paths(i) index1 = InstrRev(path, "\") dir = Mid(path, 1, index1 - 1) name = Mid(path, index1 + 1) index2 = InstrRev(name, ".") If index2 > 0 Then name = Mid(name, 1, index2 - 1) lnkPath = "" j = 1 Do lnkPath = desktop & "\" & name If j > 1 Then lnkPath = lnkPath & " (" & j & ")" lnkPath = lnkPath & ".lnk" j = j + 1 Loop While fso.FileExists(lnkPath) Set shortcut = wsh.CreateShortcut(lnkPath) shortcut.TargetPath = path shortcut.WorkingDirectory = dir shortcut.Save Next Set shortcut = Nothing Set wsh = Nothing Set fso = Nothing

Tip.Value: 解决 Hyper-V 和 VirtualBox 不能共存的问题
Fixed an issue where Hyper-V and VirtualBox could not coexist

CreateFile.Content: Dim sap, wsh Set sap = CreateObject("Shell.Application") sap.ShellExecute "bcdedit", "/set hypervisorlaunchtype auto", "" ,"runas", 0 msg = "你当前切换的模式为 Hyper-V，" & VbCrlf msg = msg & "该模式可使用 Windows SandBox 和 Hyper-V，" & VbCrlf msg = msg & "不可使用 VirtualBox 和 VMware 等虚拟机程序，" & VbCrlf msg = msg & "是否立即重启计算机应用该模式？" & VbCrlf msg = msg & "你也可稍后自行重启，请保存好工作！" If Msgbox(msg, VbYesNo + VbInformation, "虚拟模式") = VbYes Then Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") wsh.Run("shutdown -r -f -t 00") Set wsh = Nothing End If Set sap = Nothing

Dim sap, wsh Set sap = CreateObject("Shell.Application") sap.ShellExecute "bcdedit", "/set hypervisorlaunchtype auto", "" ,"runas", 0 msg = "You are currently switching mode to Hyper-V," & VbCrlf msg = msg & "This mode is available using Windows SandBox and Hyper-V," & VbCrlf msg = msg & "But Vm programs such as VirtualBox and VMware cannot be used," & VbCrlf msg = msg & "Do you want to restart the computer immediately to apply the mode?" & VbCrlf msg = msg & "You can also restart yourself later, please save your work!" If Msgbox(msg, VbYesNo + VbInformation, "Virtual Mode") = VbYes Then Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") wsh.Run("shutdown -r -f -t 00") Set wsh = Nothing End If Set sap = Nothing

Dim sap, wsh Set sap = CreateObject("Shell.Application") sap.ShellExecute "bcdedit", "/set hypervisorlaunchtype off", "", "runas", 0 msg = "你当前切换的模式为 VirtualBox，" & VbCrlf msg = msg & "该模式可使用 VirtualBox 和 VMware 等虚拟机程序，" & VbCrlf msg = msg & "不可使用 Windows SandBox 和 Hyper-V，" & VbCrlf msg = msg & "是否立即重启计算机应用该模式？" & VbCrlf msg = msg & "你也可稍后自行重启，请保存好工作！" If Msgbox(msg, VbYesNo + VbInformation, "虚拟模式") = VbYes Then Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") wsh.Run("shutdown -r -f -t 00") Set wsh = Nothing End If Set sap = Nothing

Dim sap, wsh Set sap = CreateObject("Shell.Application") sap.ShellExecute "bcdedit", "/set hypervisorlaunchtype off", "", "runas", 0 msg = "You are currently switching mode to VirtualBox，" & VbCrlf msg = msg & "This mode is available using VM programs such as VirtualBox and VMware," & VbCrlf msg = msg & "But Windows SandBox and Hyper-V are not available," & VbCrlf msg = msg & "Do you want to restart the computer immediately to apply the mode?" & VbCrlf msg = msg & "You can also restart yourself later, please save your work!" If Msgbox(msg, VbYesNo + VbInformation, "Virtual Mode") = VbYes Then Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") wsh.Run("shutdown -r -f -t 00") Set wsh = Nothing End If Set sap = Nothing

Command.Arguments: /c cd %temp% & del BatteryReport.html & powercfg /batteryreport /output BatteryReport.html & start BatteryReport.html

CreateFile.Content: taskkill /f /im explorer.exe del /f /s /q /a "%LocalAppData%\IconCache.db" cd /d "%LocalAppData%\Microsoft\Windows\Explorer" del /f /s /q /a thumbcache_*.db del /f /s /q /a iconcache_*.db reg delete "HKCR\Local Settings\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\TrayNotify" /v IconStreams /f reg delete "HKCR\Local Settings\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\TrayNotify" /v PastIconsStream /f start explorer

Command.Arguments: /R (netsh advfirewall firewall delete rule name="_%1" dir=in program="%1" & netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="_%1" dir=in program="%1" action=block)
/R (netsh advfirewall firewall delete rule name="_%1" dir=out program="%1" & netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="_%1" dir=out program="%1" action=block)
/R (netsh advfirewall firewall delete rule name="_%1" dir=in program="%1" & netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="_%1" dir=in program="%1" action=allow)
/R (netsh advfirewall firewall delete rule name="_%1" dir=out program="%1" & netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="_%1" dir=out program="%1" action=allow)
/R (netsh advfirewall firewall delete rule name="_%1" program="%1")
